snippet.title: Konami GB Collection Vol. 4 - Gradius II (Hard) [GBC] - Real Time Longplay (No death)
snippet.description:
This is a, no commentary, Longplay of Gradius II: The Return Of The Hero for Game Boy Color played on Hard. The game is part of Konami GB Collection Vol. 4. A classic game also known as Nemesis II and Gradius: The Interstellar Assault.

Descent game with better graphics and gameplay than its predecesor. Show some strategies to defeat the bosses. No death run.
 
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Game is played by me in one go. No save states/cheats have been used. Recorded in VBA23.2.

Please note I uploaded it just for fun, no intention to compete anyone.
